entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Bull. The US is still only no. 33 per capita. So not leading anything. Actually lacking behind many comparable western countries. So pull the other leg.
